text: Da-a dosa iran si-i ko manga Ama iran, go da ko manga Wata iran a manga Mama, go da ko manga laki ran, go da ko manga Wata a manga Mama o manga lakÄ± ran, go da ko manga Wata a manga Mama o manga Pagari ran, go da ko manga Babai kiran, go da ko Miyakhapa-ar o manga tangan niran (1 dosa). Na kalukun niran so Allah; Mata-an! A so Allah na Tatap a Saksi ko langowan taman
